keyMoments.title: Saldeath's Debut
keyMoments.description: Saldeath, the imp-like Chief Guard who commands the Blue Gorillas, makes his first appearance on Level 3 of Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a tactical commander within Impel Down's guard hierarchy who uses intelligence over brute force.

keyMoments.title: Sets Seastone Net Trap
keyMoments.description: Saldeath successfully captures Luffy, Buggy, Mr. 3, and the Sphinx using a Seastone net trap, demonstrating his tactical intelligence.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Saldeath's competence as a guard who understands how to counter Devil Fruit users effectively.

affiliations.role: Chief Guard - Commander of Blue Gorillas

abilities.description: Saldeath commands the Blue Gorillas (Blugori) using his pitchfork, which functions as a flute to issue orders.
Demonstrates tactical thinking by using traps and strategy rather than direct confrontation with powerful opponents.

reveals.information: Chief Guard of Impel Down, commanding the Blue Gorillas on Level 3
Uses a pitchfork that functions as a flute to command Blue Gorillas

keyMoments.title: Bentham Found Imprisoned on Level 3
keyMoments.description: Buggy and Mr. 3 encounter Bentham imprisoned on Level 3 of Impel Down. Despite imprisonment and harsh conditions, his spirited personality remains unchanged.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Bentham's fate after the Alabasta arc and sets up his important role in helping Luffy. His undiminished spirit provides hope and comic relief.

keyMoments.title: Bentham's Kiss to the Camera
keyMoments.description: At the episode's conclusion, Bentham delivers his signature kiss toward the screen, stamping the 'To be continued' card.
keyMoments.significance: Re-establishes his flamboyant personality and creates an iconic end-of-episode moment.

statusHistory.reason: Captured and imprisoned in Impel Down Level 3 after Alabasta arc

relationships.description: Reunites with Buggy on Level 3 of Impel Down.

evolutionMoments.description: Bentham encounters Buggy and Mr. 3 while imprisoned on Level 3.

relationships.description: Former colleague from Baroque Works, reunites in Impel Down.

evolutionMoments.description: Reunites with fellow former Baroque Works agent Mr. 3 in prison.

reveals.information: Imprisoned in Impel Down Level 3 after Alabasta arc events
Maintains flamboyant personality and spirit despite harsh prison conditions

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Level 3 - Starvation Hell
keyMoments.description: Luffy falls through to Level 3 of Impel Down and experiences the extreme heat and harsh conditions of this level.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Luffy's continued descent through Impel Down toward his goal of rescuing Ace.

keyMoments.title: Confirmed as Ace's Brother to Marines
keyMoments.description: Sengoku officially confirms to Garp that Luffy and Ace are brothers, connected by the 'D' in their names.
keyMoments.significance: The Marines now officially know of the brotherly bond between Luffy and Ace, information that will be used strategically.

relationships.description: Brotherhood officially confirmed to the Marines by Sengoku.

evolutionMoments.description: Their brotherhood is officially acknowledged by Marine Fleet Admiral Sengoku.

reveals.information: Brotherhood with Ace officially known to the Marines
